entries.meaning: An organism produced by mating of individuals of different varieties or breeds.
examples: When I ask about these dogs, they are described to me as the local mutts, mongrels, pavement specials, crossbreeds.

verbs.description: crossbreed (third-person singular simple present crossbreeds, present participle crossbreeding, simple past and past participle crossbred)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To produce (an organism) by the mating of individuals of different breeds, varieties, or species; hybridize.
(intransitive) To mate so as to produce a hybrid; interbreed.
(transitive) To mate (an organism) with another organism so as to produce a hybrid.
